flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Sketchup Model

Additional Materials Required:

  • 3/4"x2" Bolts (2)
  • 3/4" Steel Nuts (2)
  • 3/4" Galvanized Nuts (2)
guide.introduction_rendered:
Sketchup Model

Additional Materials Required:

  • 3/4"x2" Bolts (2)
  • 3/4" Steel Nuts (2)
  • 3/4" Galvanized Nuts (2)
Tools
  • Angle grinder
  • Square
  • Welder
  • torch

lines.text: Torch the hole in the 2x2 angle as shown.
lines.text_raw: Torch the hole in the 2x2 angle as shown.

lines.text: Weld the angle centered on the U-channel
lines.text_raw: Weld the angle centered on the U-channel

lines.text: Weld a 3/4" bolt over the hole.
lines.text_raw: Weld a 3/4" bolt over the hole.

lines.text: Put a galvanized nut on a 3/4"x2" bolt and thread through the welded nut on each side
lines.text_raw: Put a galvanized nut on a 3/4"x2" bolt and thread through the welded nut on each side

guide.title: CEB: Wide Cylinder Supports
